body: Magarena Limited Edition is unable to download card images, this needs to be restored so that a release of Magarena can download the card images by itself.
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: restore ability to download images
content:
_From [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/) on May 20, 2011 16:35:17_

Magarena Limited Edition is unable to download card images, this needs to be restored so that a release of Magarena can download the card images by itself.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=12_
